rooms.description: A welcoming entrance area leading to the interior living spaces. The hallway is designed with art deco motifs such as geometric patterns and chrome finishes.

An expansive art deco inspired living room featuring elegant streamlined furniture, recessed lighting, and decorative moldings in line with Vastu principles ensuring positive energy flow from the entrance.

A modern, compact kitchen integrated within the ground floor, designed for efficiency and functionality. The layout respects local building norms by providing ventilation and safety features while incorporating art deco details.

An adjoining dining area seamlessly connected to the living room. Designed with subtle art deco aesthetics including geometric patterns and balanced proportions as per Vastu for harmonious gatherings.

A dedicated home theater space, complete with soundproof walls, ambient lighting, and a projection system. The design balances modern entertainment needs while incorporating subtle art deco elements in its detailing.
A small utility area for storage of cleaning supplies and appliances, ensuring functionality without compromising aesthetics.
